resources.string:
I have read and understood

Terms & Conditions and

Privacy Notice
Ringoid will send an SMS message (carrier charges may apply) to verify your phone number.
We will hide your profile from your friend, and your friend\'s profile will be hidden from you. Let\'s make it safer for everyone.
Both you and a person who invited you will receive 50 credits.
To invite others, ask them to open the referral link.
To continue, please check all boxes
Don\'t show my photos to users (and don\'t show their photos to me, and don\'t allow them to like, match or chat with me) who have registered their Ringoid accounts to the following phone numbers
Only your match can message first
Ringoid will automatically block the profile after you report it. They won\'t see your photos again (and you won\'t see theirs). They won\'t be able to like, match or chat with you.
Do you want to block this user?

They won\'t be able to see your photos ever again (and you won\'t see theirs). They won\'t be able to like, match or chat with you. Chat history (if any) will be deleted for both of you. There is no undo.
Ringoid users of the opposite sex\n(Regular mode)
Only users whom photos I liked\n(Incognito mode)
Who can see how many times your photos were liked?
Who can see who liked you?
Can search engines find and index your photos?
Who can see your phone number?
Who can find your profile by your phone number?
Personal data that Ringoid holds about you
Who can see which photos you liked?
Who can see which photos you reported?
Don\'t show my photos to users (and don\'t show their photos to me, and don\'t allow them to like, match or chat with me) who is closer than
Do you want to log out?
You will need to have access to your phone number to log in again. You won\'t be able to return to your account in any other way.
Do you want to delete your account?
Your profile will become deactivated and your photos will be hidden from everyone immediately.
If you don\'t log in within 30 days then your account will be deleted permanently. You will lose all likes that your photos received (which affects your popularity ranking in a geographical area).
If you just want to hide your photos from everyone, you can do it on Privacy screen.
You just got a new match
Your match sent you a new message
Ringoid hides your age, location, distance, and online status from everyone.
Ringoid doesn\'t integrate with Facebook or Instagram, and doesn\'t collect your name, email, address, place of study or work.
You can blacklist phone numbers, show your photos only to people you liked first, and set minimum safety distance to prevent people who are too close to see your photos.
Ringoid shows you who liked you and allows you to like as many photos of others as you want.
You can see how many times each of your photos were liked.
All of that for free, including chatting with your matches.
Ringoid sorts profiles by geographical distance and popularity (likes).
The more likes your photos received, the higher your popularity ranking in a geographical area and the more people of the opposite sex can discover you.
Photos with more likes are shown first. Only you can see how many likes your photos have.
Can people who didn\'t register their phone numbers get access to your photos in Ringoid?
Can Ringoid users of the same sex discover your profile and browse your photos?
Who can login into your account without access to your phone number?
Who can see your current location?
Who can see distance between you and others?
Who can see your location history?
Who can see your date of birth?
Who can see which profiles you blocked?
Who can see when and how often you use Ringoid?
I am of legal age and adult, as defined by the country or state from where I am accessing Ringoid app
Who can send photos in a chat?
Who can see that you read chat messages?
Who can see when you have sent chat messages?
Who can see that you are online?
Who can see when you were online last time?
+%s %s looks invalid. Most likely we won\'t be able to send SMS with a verification code to validate it. Do you still want to proceed?
No one. Users can see that you liked them and the total number of likes for each photo but not who liked which photo(s).
Who can see which photos you liked and then unliked?
Who can see which photos you viewed?
Who can see how many times you viewed photos?
Who receives a notification that you viewed their profile?
A person with whom I matched or me
A person with whom I matched or me. After I sent emoji to my match, I allow them to reply with text messages
Who can make screenshots of your text messages and emojis displayed in Chat?
No one. Users with smartphones that run Android version 5.0 and higher can\'t make screenshots in Ringoid (except screenshots of their own photos, Privacy and Settings screens).
Who can discover your photos if your face looks similar to someone\'s else?
No one. Ringoid doesn\'t allow lookalike or face search, or reverse image search.
Who can see your popularity ranking in a geographical area?
No one. Only you can see how many likes your photos received.
Who can see that you bumped into other users?
Who can see your activity history?
Who can copy your text messages to the clipboard from a chat?
Who can paste a text message from the clipboard in order to send it to you in a chat?
Who can download your photos in Ringoid?
Who can share your profile via Ringoid?
Who can make screenshots of your photos displayed in Who Liked You, Matches and New Faces?
No one. Users with smartphones that run Android version 5.0 and higher can\'t make screenshots in Ringoid (except screenshots of their own photos, Privacy and Settings screens).
Who can see how many phone numbers you blacklisted?
Who can migrate your account to different phone number?
No one. Due to security reasons, Ringoid customer support won\'t be able to recover your account if you can\'t access your phone number, and doesn\'t migrate an account to a different phone number.
Who can see what phone numbers you blacklisted?
How many Ringoid apps linked to your phone number can run concurrently?
Only one. The most recent login will take over, and all other sessions will be signed out automatically.
Who can recover after you logout a chat history between you and your matches?

No one. There is no way to recover chat history after you logout or reinstall Ringoid because the server doesn\'t store messages in the database after they are delivered to the app. When you login after logout, the app loads your photos, how many likes your photos received, your matches, who liked you, and privacy settings.
